item.title: Raichur: BSNL copper cables worth Rs 30 lakh stolen from main office
item.description:
<![CDATA[3 hours ago MUDA case: Court raps Lokayukta over delay in submitting final report
4 hours ago Youth arrested in Mangaluru for spreading false and provocative content against police on social media
4 hours ago Three arrested for gangrape, blackmail of college student in Bengaluru
4 hours ago Cases against 88 police involved in criminal activities; will be dismissed if proven: Minister
4 hours ago Man arrested for secretly filming minor girl in bathroom
5 hours ago K'taka Assembly passes coun...]]>
